name: Level Design Assignment - Block Only
description:
This project was created in Unreal Engine 4 for an assignment in a level design class as part of my last semester of graduate school. I was given 1 week to design a level. Part of the assignment was that we were only allowed to use basic materials with no textures, we were only allowed to use a unit block to create our level, and only use the default unreal third person controller with the default jump. 

Thanks for playing!! Feel free to leave feedback!
